posts.post_content:
@guest57443454: [Yawgmoth's bargain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Yawgmoth's bargain) is broken even without this card. I think [Necropotence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necropotence) is what you meant.
  
   
@socialexperiment: First turn 3 drops are only part of the power of this. You use multiple copies to reduce mana costs greatly. Hell, [Ihsan's Shade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ihsan's Shade) was played only due to the easy mana this provided, and its un-swordsability
